body:
Sorry for the massive PR - can split if needed. Contents:
* Madgraph: update to 2.8.1, since 2.8.0 is no longer available on launchpad
* lhapdf: now `extends('python')` to get correct `PYTHONPATH` 
* Rivet: 3.1.0 marked as "preferred", since newer ones doesn't build - reported to devs; added dependency on cython
* Syscalc: fix hash (see also #19323)
* thepeg: force autoreconf
* New packages: `py-gosam`, `form`, `njet`, `qd`, `qgraf`, `herwig3`.
title: Add Herwig3 and dependencies
